C1.name: PRIVACY
C1.description: Personally Identifiable Information (PII) requiring protection from unauthorized disclosure. Includes general PII and Sensitive PII.
C1.handling: Encrypt in transit and at rest. Prevent unnecessary distribution. Apply Privacy Act or SORN constraints if applicable.

C2.name: EXPORT
C2.description: Information limited by export control laws such as ITAR and EAR, including technical data, defense articles, or dual-use technologies.
C2.handling: Strictly prohibit release to unauthorized foreign persons. Enforce ITAR/EAR technical data controls. Maintain audit records.

C3.name: FINPROT
C3.description: Financially sensitive information, including transactional, operational, or proprietary financial details protected under regulatory frameworks.
C3.handling: Restrict to authorized individuals. Protect confidentiality and integrity. Apply encryption when transported or stored.

C4.name: PROCURE
C4.description: Information related to acquisition, bidding, procurement, and contract negotiation that must be protected during competitive phases.
C4.handling: Prevent release prior to official publication. Maintain chain of custody. Limit to acquisition personnel.

C5.name: LEGAL
C5.description: Attorney-client privileged information, legal analyses, litigation strategy, or regulatory investigation details requiring controlled distribution.
C5.handling: Restrict strictly to authorized legal representatives. Ensure tamper-evident logging and secure storage.

C6.name: TECHDATA
C6.description: Technical specifications, engineering drawings, operational parameters, or internal system documentation requiring controlled distribution.
C6.handling: Store securely. Permit distribution only to personnel with operational need. May overlap with EXPORT when technical data is export-controlled.
